argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | psrplusg.s | |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) |
| 2 |  | psrplusg.b | |- B = ( Base ` S ) |
| 3 |  | psrplusg.a | |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) |
| 4 |  | psrplusg.p | |- .+b = ( +g ` S ) |
| 5 |  | psradd.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 6 |  | psradd.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_psrplusg | |- .+b = ( oF .+ |` ( B X. B ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_oveqi | |- ( X .+b Y ) = ( X ( oF .+ |` ( B X. B ) ) Y ) |
| 9 | 5, 6 | #P_ofmresval | |- ( ph -> ( X ( oF .+ |` ( B X. B ) ) Y ) = ( X oF .+ Y ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ph -> ( X .+b Y ) = ( X oF .+ Y ) ) |
